QuestData.Title: The Real Threat
QuestData.Description: Or'Kalar leads the ogres here. He has evaded slaughter for years. His very presence is an affront to the Dark Lady; Mug'thol, traitor to the Forsaken, commands him from afar!$B$BWe do not suffer ogres or traitors on Forsaken land. Bring me this ogre's head and I will make sure it's burned properly this time.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Or'Kalar stands a head taller than any of his kin. I'd like you to remedy that.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Or'Kalar and take his head.
QuestData.RewardText: This is the fate of all who would stand in our way.
